text: @Alyssa_Milano Well I am not a doctor, not even close, but antibiotics work on bacteria, on bacterial infections, COVID19 is a virus, antibiotics don’t work on viruses. Trump is correct that these 🦠mutate and that treatments that use to work, no longer do. The 🤬anti-vaccine people don’t help.
